description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Pure 1 vs. 1 soccer action. Play against 10 teams in Championship. Become the best by increasing your skills with experience you have earned. Compete with your friends in multiplayer.
description.short: Pure 1 vs. 1 soccer action. Play against 10 teams in Championship. Become the best by increasing your skills with experience you have earned. Compete with your friends in multiplayer.
